Pull Philippines data on cases information from the publicly available Department of Health COVID-19 Data Drop

Source: R/ph_datadrop.R
ph_get_cases.Rd

A wrapper to googledrive and googlesheets4 functions to pull data from the Philppines' COVID-19 Data Drop resource that is publicly distributed via Google Drive

ph_get_cases(date = Sys.Date())

Arguments

date

Date in <YYYY-MM-DD> format; This is the date up to which extracted data reports to. Default is current date (Sys.Date())

Value

A tibble

Examples

ph_get_cases(date = "2020-04-17")
#> # A tibble: 5,878 x 12
#>    CaseNo   Age AgeGroup Sex   DateRepConf DateRecover DateDied RemovalType
#>    <fct>  <int> <fct>    <fct> <fct>       <fct>       <fct>    <fct>
